code: @Manual{,   title = {tamRgo: Digital Pets in R},   author = {Matt Dray},   year = {2022},   note = {https://matt-dray.github.io/tamRgo/, https://github.com/matt-dray/tamRgo}, }

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Tamago (egg) + uotchi (‘watch’) = Tamagotchi. Tamago + R = {tamRgo}. work--progress R package lets interact R console little digital pet lives computer.

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Install {tamRgo} GitHub. package currently dependency free, need R version 4 higher.

title: Digital Pets in R
text: Much package’s functionality yet developed. can expect code change great deal. See GitHub issues upcoming functionality. must first request egg laid. stores persistent blueprint pet computer safekeeping. time can see latest stats pet. values update time. example, longer wait interact pet, higher ‘hunger’ status value get. can release pet feel time right. delete blueprint computer.
code: lay_egg("KEVIN") # Save pet blueprint? y/n: y # Saved pet blueprint. # You have a new egg! see_stats() # Characteristics #   - Name:    KEVIN #   - Species: Z #   - Born:    2022-09-20 #   - Age:     0 # Experience #   - Level:   1 #   - XP:      0 # Status #   - Happy:   0/5 #   - Hungry:  0/5 #   - Dirty:   0/5 release_pet() # Really release KEVIN? y/n: y # Are you sure? y/n: y # KEVIN was set free!

title: Digital Pets in R
text: package’s main mechanism persistent storage ‘blueprint’—RDS file containing list pet-related values—saved path resolved tools::R_user_dir("tamRgo", = "data"). values blueprint updated player interacts pet, given time ’s elapsed since last interaction.

Update Blueprint Given Time — .update_blueprint
text: Update time-dependent blueprint values given much time elapsed since last recorded interaction.

title: Update Blueprint Given Time — .update_blueprint
text: happy_increment Integer. many minutes must elapse 'happy' status value decreases 1? hungry_increment Integer. many minutes must elapse 'hungry' status value decreases 1? dirty_increment Integer. many minutes must elapse 'dirty' status value decreases 1? xp_increment Integer. many minutes must elapse pet gains 1 XP (experience point)?

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9001
text: Shifted focus fully local experience (#20). Added internal functions .create_, .write_, .read_ .update_blueprint()s. Introduced time-dependent blueprint updates (toward #9). Added exported functions lay_egg(), see_stats() release_pet(). Added startup message (#6). Updated README DESCRIPTION. Added NEWS file track changes.

title: tamRgo 0.0.0.9000
text: Set package, README, license, sample data, {pkgdown} website, low-level user-facing functions. Developed first attempt function architecture, leant heavily GitHub gists storing pet blueprints remotely.
